channel.title: The Pink Dev
channel.description: Recent content on The Pink Dev

item.title: Expense Tracker
item.description: Project Requirements A minimalist Expense Tracker App. Project Description A multi-user MERN full-stack App designed to track expenses, uses Firebase Authentication.

item.title: Restaurant Ordering App
item.description: Project Description I built this full-stack app with React and a mix of different technologies, to experiment with Stripe Payments API in REST routing system.

item.title: Running Log App
item.description: Project Description This app is a React Project intended to keep track of my daily running stats in terms of Pace, BPM and Run Types.

item.title: Hannoi Tower
item.description: Project Requirements A classic Hannoi Tower, in Javascript Project Details See it in action here

item.title: What's a Full Stack Developer?
item.description: So, you have decided to jump into the coding and developing world but are not sure (yet) what a Fullstack Developer does and if that‚Äôs for you.

item.title: Hangman Game
item.description: Project Description A fun mini Javascript project. This project was built purely with JS.

item.title: Where to claim your Free Code Camp Certificates?
item.description: Congrats, you earned a Free Code Camp Certificate! üëè Amazing. You have put in all your effort and you have finished all Free Code Camp‚Äôs Responsive Web Design Challenges and all 5 projects passed, but you cannot find your beautiful certificate anywhere on your profile?

item.title: Where to start as a Web Developer?
item.description: What do I need to learn first if I want to become a developer and I know nothing about coding?

item.title: Real Time Bus Tracker
item.description: Project Description This project provides a visual real-time tracking display of the Route #1 of Boston, running between Harvard and Nubian.

item.title: My first Certificate: Become a Web Developer
item.description: Yay! So, right at the very end of 2020, I received my first certificate for this new adventure.

item.title: Follow The Eyes
item.description: Project Description This project is all about mouse movements. The Eyes of our pink friend will follow your mouse all over the place.

item.title: PacMan Factory
item.description: Project Details This Project is a PacMan Factory, go back to the 80’s and have fun by randomly creating and adding PacMan figures to the DOM with ramdom speed and directions.

item.title: To-Do List
item.description: Project Description My very First To-Do List App This App was created using CSS, HTML, JSX, and React Components, to understand CRUD, and as an intro to useState.

item.title: Hello (coding) world!
item.description: Yep, the world during the Pandemic has been a rollercoaster. It took everything we knew, shook it, and showed us a totally different world, and most importantly, it showed us what was really important to us.
